MemoryInfobox.description: 'Gaining the trust of the 'Courtesan|hetaerae' was easier said than done. When Client (Odyssey)|one of their clients acted strangely, a reluctant Damalis asked Kassandra to investigate what could have changed him.'

General_Description: '''To Help a Girl''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Dialogue:
After talking with [[Anthousa]], Kassandra located Damalis outside at the [[Spring of Peirene]].
*'''Damalis:''' ''So you're here to help us, ''misthios''? You don't ''look'' like a [[The Monger|Monger]] spy.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm more the in-your-face type. You have a Monger problem, Damalis?''
*'''Damalis:''' ''I might. One of my regulars has... changed. He was a decent man once, but now, he's gone bad.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''[[Korinth]] seems to have a shortage of "decent" people.''
*'''Damalis:''' ''I need someone with muscle to figure out what's behind the change. ''Why'' he's different.''
<tabber>
|-|What is the man doing wrong?=
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 01.png|thumb|250px|Damalis speaking to Kassandra]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He's gotten you scared.''
*'''Damalis:''' ''He asks me questions I don't know the answers to about our [[drachma]]e. Where we keep money, what Anthousa invests in. As though we're [[Athens|Athenian]] aristocrats.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Can't Anthousa intervene?''
*'''Damalis:''' ''I'm not naive! I won't expose others to this. So he can go after them next?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He might anyway. Sounds like he needs answers.''
|-|What was he like before?=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Who was he before all this?''
*'''Damalis:''' ''Obsessive, but never threatening. He didn't stand out in symposiums, until he had his drachmae act for him.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, something's sure giving him courage now.''
|-|I'll go talk to him.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll see what he has to say for himself.''
*'''Damalis:''' ''If he's not lurking around here, he'll be at his house. I want this to end ''today''.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It will. People tend to show their true selves to my [[Spear of Leonidas|spear]] whether they like it or not.''
</tabber>
Kassandra left the Spring in search of the client's house. Outside of the house, she heard a familiar voice calling to her.
*'''[[Phoibe]]:''' ''Kassandra! It's me! Kassandra!''
Kassandra approached Phoibe.
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Good, you found me!''
*'''Kassandra:''' Shh!'' What are you doing here?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I heard Damalis talking about her crazy client earlier and I wanted to help!''
<tabber>
|-|You better behave.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine. But you have to do as I say. No games!''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I know that already—because you never let me have any fun!''
|-|Good idea, Phoibe.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You may be right. I could use you.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''See? That was my plan all along!''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm going to talk to Damalis' client and see what he has to say.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I've been here. Spying. And I heard him mumbling to himself! He's weird. But maybe if I tell you what he said, it could help?''
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 03.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra accepting Phoibe's help]]
<tabber>
|-|Tell me what he said.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's hear it.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Let me think... He said something about having to meet someone at [[Phaia's Pig Farm|Pig Farm]] tonight. That could help!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It could. Did he mention why?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''To get something from them. A deed to some land, I think he said.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, that's something. What else?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Oh, he said their name! [[Deinomenes]]. Wonder who that is?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Good to know. Thank you, Phoibe the spy.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Not bad, huh?''
|-|No, let's get to work=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''.''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Time to act. Listen closely. You sneak inside and see what you can find in his house while I distract him.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Quiet like a mouse!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Good. But if you get caught, run. Right out the door. We'll meet afterwards. Promise?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I'm ready. Let's go!''
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 04.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra confronting the client]]
While Phoibe snuck around the rear of the house, Kassandra entered the home and confronted the client.
*'''Client:''' ''Do I know you?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No. But I know you.''
*'''Client:''' ''If [[Myron]] sent you, tell him I was going to pay him back this very night!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No one sent me. We need to talk. I know you're up to something—''
*'''Client:''' ''Something? Something could be anything! You have nothing on me.''
<tabber>
|-|You have a meeting at Phaia's goat farm.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're meeting someone tonight, aren't you? At Phaia's [[goat]] farm.''
*'''Client:''' ''A goat farm? You'll find no goats at Phaia's.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Oh, I...''
The man noticed Phoebe sneaking through his house.
*'''Client:''' ''Wait! [[Thief]]! Thieves! Get out! [[Guard]]s! Get them!''
Kassandra was forced to kill the client and the guards before meeting back up with Phoibe.
*'''Phoibe:''' ''What was all that noise?!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Damalis doesn't have to worry about her client now.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''That wasn't what she wanted you to do!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I dealt with him, didn't I?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Well... At least I could sneak in OK. Look!''
|-|You have a meeting at Phaia's cow farm.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're meeting someone tonight, aren't you? At Phaia's [[Cattle|cow]] farm.''
*'''Client:''' ''A cow farm? You'll find no cows at Phaia's.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Oh, I...''
The man noticed Phoebe sneaking through his house.
*'''Client:''' ''Wait! Thief! Thieves! Get out! Guards! Get them!''
Kassandra was forced to kill the client and the guards before meeting back up with Phoibe.
*'''Phoibe:''' ''What was all that noise?!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Damalis doesn't have to worry about her client now.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''That wasn't what she wanted you to do!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I dealt with him, didn't I?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Well... At least I could sneak in OK. Look!''
|-|You have a meeting at Phaia's pig farm.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're going to Phaia's Pig Farm. And meeting some like-minded person there, I hear.''
*'''Client:''' ''Where did you hear that? You're wrong. Dead wrong.''
{{#tag:tabber|
You're getting deed to some land.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They owe you a deed to some land. What that land'll be used for, I don't know.''
*'''Client:''' ''A spy. What else do you have on me? Cough it up.''
{{#tag:tabber|
You're meeting Deinomenes.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Deinomenes will be quite upset if I don't let you meet him tonight.''
*'''Client:''' ''How? What do you want?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I know about Damalis. And as her client, you seem to think she owes you something.''
In the background, Phoibe left the house with her hands full.
*'''Client:''' ''I ''do'' love her, you know. With my whole heart.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And yet, you're scaring her.''
*'''Client:''' ''Better me than another more careless man. Either I hurt Damalis, or I'm killed!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's not love, it's weakness.''
*'''Client:''' ''You say it as though I don't know. He knew that too. That's why he's making me!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Who's making you?''
*'''Client:''' ''Tell Damalis I'll stop. That I'm sorry.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine. ''Chaire'', old man.''
Forlorn, the man turned back to his papers, and Kassandra left.
{{!}}-{{!}}
You're meeting Deinomache.=
(Man notices Phoibe, alerts guards, gets slain by Kassandra.)
{{!}}-{{!}}

{{!}}-{{!}}

{{!}}-{{!}}

</tabber>
Outside, Kassandra found Phoibe near a table with her loot.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's see what we found.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I wonder what this means?''
<tabber>
|-|What about the coin purse?=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What's this, a coin purse?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''His things aren't very nice, though. If he's rich, why have all that junk?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He must have just gotten paid.''
|-|What about the iron poker?=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've seen that iron poker [[The Serpent's Lair|used]] before.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''He didn't have a furnace! Why does he have this?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's not used for fire... It's a weapon. For torture. I saw someone use it in [[Phokis]]. Someone huge.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Huge like the Monger?''
*'''Kassandra:''' Just ''like the Monger.''
|-|Let's see the letter.=
</tabber>
Phoibe showed Kassandra a letter.
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 08.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra Phoibe going through the loot]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What does the letter say?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''It's mean! It says he'll get hurt if he keeps doing things wrong.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I thought as much.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''And it says more... That he needs to bring Damalis to a [[Abron House|place]] here in Korinth. There's directions. What do you think it is?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't know... But I'll find out.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Right behind you!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Not this time. Go to Damalis and wait for me there.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Aw, please?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You've done enough for today, It could be dangerous. I'll come find you after.''
(If the players chose everything 'right' before.)
*'''Phoibe:''' ''Fine. I almost forgot. I got this [[sword]] for you from his house.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Wow. You're a good thief.''
(Kassandra received a randomly generated sword.)
As Phoibe left, Kassandra pondered while leaving to look for the place mentioned in the letter.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''A place to bring Damalis. A prison? I should find out.''
A short walk later, she found the location.
[[File:ACOD_Abron_House.jpg|thumb|250px|The Abron House]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This must be the place described in the letter. Anybody home?''
She investigated the area, coming across a large pot, covering a patch of blood-drenched ground.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's blood. Lots of it.''
Making her way inside the house, she discovered a collection of casts, mostly of breasts, on the wall.
*'''Kassandra:''' Maláka''. What is this?''
The nearby desk had another clue.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''A lock of hair. Smells familiar, somehow.''
There were also other curiosities in the place.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Chains? Oil? This can't be what I think it is.''
A man entered the building, dragging and tossing Phoibe inside.
*'''[[The Stalker]]:''' ''Gotcha! All right you little shit, who sent you?''
Phoibe scurried behind Kassandra.
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 11.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra instructing Phoibe to run]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What are you doing here?''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I wanted to help?''
*'''The Stalker:''' ''Give her here.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave, Phoibe. Now!''
The man moved to go after Phoibe as she ran past him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't take another step.''
*'''The Stalker:''' ''You're brave coming here. You want a whipping? The Monger would ''love'' to take you on.''
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 12.png|thumb|250px|The Stalker confronting Kassandra]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He'd rot in the [[underworld]] for that.''
*'''The Stalker:''' ''Prude. This is [[Korinthia]]! Anything goes in this sex ''andron''. And the Monger ''will'' be satiated.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're as sick as he is, worm.''
*'''The Stalker:''' ''Whether they like it or not, any victim he likes gets his special treatment. I'll tell him you volunteer.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You'll get ''my'' special treatment right now. I'll fucking kill you.''
Kassandra did as she threatened, then returned to Damalis and Phoibe near a statue of [[Aphrodite]].
*'''Damalis:''' ''Kassandra. Your little friend beat you back.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You made it.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''And fast. I know all the shortcuts now. I'm sorry, Kassandra.''
<tabber>
|-|I forgive you, Phoibe.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all right. You had good intentions.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I thought I could sneak in... Like before.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm glad you didn't. Especially with what I found there.''
|-|Don't do it again.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Listen next time I tell you to do something.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''OK.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I promise it's for your own good. This time, especially.''
</tabber>
*'''Damalis:''' ''What happened to you?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I just left the Monger's sex ''andron'', if you can believe it. And it's where you were headed.''
*'''Damalis:''' ''No.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's true. Your client was being forced to take you there. And we found these.''
[[File:ACOD To Help A Girl 13.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra reporting her findings to Damalis]]
Kassandra handed Damalis the letters, and she read them.
*'''Damalis:''' ''What does this mean?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It means the Monger got to him. He ''does'' have his hand in everything.''
*'''Damalis:''' ''At least I know how to deal with him now that I know what he's after.''
<tabber>
|-|If the Client lives=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He'll leave you alone now. He gave me his word.''
*'''Damalis:''' ''So we really ''can'' trust you, can't we?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We're not all so easily blackmailed.''
|-|If the Client died=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You won't have to. I took care of him myself.''
*'''Phoibe:''' ''I told Kassandra she shouldn't have!''
*'''Damalis:''' ''It had to come to this. ''Maláka'', what a fool he was.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The Monger's the real fool. He'll find that out soon enough.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Damalis figure out her client, and learned of the Monger's activities in Korinth at the same time with Phoibe's help.
Section_Trivia: *The extend of Phoibe's loot is comparative to the time she spent within the house. The letter is the only thing required. The randomly generated sword is a reward for choosing correctly each time.
